subject: Automobile Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The five-time defending Nascar champion Jimmie Johnson beat out the N.H.R.A. Funny Car champion John Force for the Driver of the Year award.
snippet: The five-time defending Nascar champion Jimmie Johnson beat out the N.H.R.A. Funny Car champion John Force for the Driver of the Year award.
